data.lyric:
[ti:Bohemian Rhapsody]
[ar:Queen]
[al:Live Killers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bohemian Rhapsody (Live, European Tour / 1979) - Queen (皇后乐队)
[00:15.61]Written by：Freddie Mercury
[00:31.22]Mama just killed a man
[00:35.15]
[00:37.14]Put a gun against his head pulled my trigger now he's dead
[00:41.89]
[00:43.36]Mama life had just begun
[00:47.78]
[00:49.53]But now I've gone and thrown it all away
[00:54.46]
[00:56.05]Mama ooh didn't mean to make you cry
[01:04.46]
[01:05.35]If I'm not back again this time tomorrow
[01:09.14]
[01:10.01]Carry on carry on as if nothing really matters
[01:15.20]
[01:26.29]Too late my time has come
[01:30.52]
[01:32.25]Sends shivers down my spine body's aching all the time
[01:37.53]
[01:38.96]Goodbye everybody I've got to go
[01:43.07]
[01:45.21]Gotta leave you all behind and face the truth
[01:49.41]
[01:51.94]Mama ooh
[01:55.51]
[01:58.12]I don't want to die
[02:00.10]
[02:01.19]I sometimes wish I'd never been born at all
[02:06.90]
[02:33.93]I see a little silhouetto of a man
[02:36.45]Scaramouche scaramouche will you do the fandango
[02:39.72]Thunderbolt and lightning very very fright'ning me
[02:43.61]Galileo galileo galileo galileo galileo figaro magnifico
[02:50.19]I'm just a poor boy nobody loves me
[02:53.15]He's just a poor boy from a poor family
[02:56.24]Spare him his life from this monstrosity
[02:58.85]
[03:01.37]Easy come easy go will you let me go
[03:03.86]Bismillah no we will not let you go
[03:06.96]Let him go bismillah we will not let you go
[03:10.05]Let him go bismillah we will not let you go
[03:13.28]Let me go will not let you go
[03:14.80]Let me go will not let you go let me go ah
[03:18.38]No no no no no no no
[03:20.97]Oh mamma mia mamma mia mamma mia let me go
[03:24.11]Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me for me for me
[03:32.36]
[03:41.70]So you think you can stone me and spit in my eye
[03:46.16]
[03:47.43]So you think you can love me and leave me to die
[03:52.20]Oh baby can't do this to me baby
[03:57.83]
[03:58.71]Just gotta get out just gotta get right outta here
[04:03.71]
[04:44.09]Nothing really matters anyone can see
[04:49.33]
[04:50.39]Nothing really matters
[04:52.61]
[04:55.20]Nothing really matters to me
[05:03.54]
[05:16.03]Any way the wind blows
data.trans:
[ti:Bohemian Rhapsody]
[ar:Queen]
[al:Live Killers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:15.61]//
[00:31.22]妈妈，我刚杀了一个人
[00:35.15]
[00:37.14]把枪口抵住他的头 扣下了扳机，现在，他死了
[00:41.89]
[00:43.36]妈妈，生活才刚刚开始
[00:47.78]
[00:49.53]现在却全毁了
[00:54.46]
[00:56.05]妈妈 我不是故意要惹你伤心落泪
[01:04.46]
[01:05.35]如果明天这个时候我没有回来
[01:09.14]
[01:10.01]你要活下去，装作什么都没有发生
[01:15.20]
[01:26.29]太迟了，我的死期到了
[01:30.52]
[01:32.25]让我毛骨悚然 全身痛苦不堪
[01:37.53]
[01:38.96]再见了，各位！我要走了
[01:43.07]
[01:45.21]我得离开你们去面对现实
[01:49.41]
[01:51.94]妈妈
[01:55.51]
[01:58.12]我不想死啊
[02:00.10]
[02:01.19]有时候我希望自己没有出生到这个世上
[02:06.90]
[02:33.93]我看到一个男人的侧影
[02:36.45]胆小鬼，你会跳西班牙舞吗
[02:39.72]雷鸣与闪电把我吓坏了
[02:43.61]伽利略 伽利略 伽利略是费加罗贵族
[02:50.19]我只是个穷人的孩子，没有人喜欢我
[02:53.15]他是一个来自穷苦人家的可怜孩子
[02:56.24]饶了这个怪胎一命吧
[02:58.85]
[03:01.37]我总是任人使唤，你能放我走吗
[03:03.86]不！我们不会放你走(放他走吧)
[03:06.96]我们不会放你走(放他走吧)
[03:10.05]我们不会放你走(放他走吧)
[03:13.28]不让你走（让我去吧）
[03:14.80]不让你走（让我去吧
[03:18.38]不不不不不不
[03:20.97]噢妈妈咪呀让我走吧
[03:24.11]恶魔已向我逼近 一步步逼近
[03:32.36]
[03:41.70]你认为你可以对我丢石块或吐口水在我的眼睛
[03:46.16]
[03:47.43]你认为你可以爱我，也可以不管我的死活
[03:52.20]噢！宝贝，千万别这样对我
[03:57.83]
[03:58.71]我想出去，我想逃出这个地方
[04:03.71]
[04:44.09]已经无关紧要了 任何人都看得出来
[04:49.33]
[04:50.39]已经无关紧要了
[04:52.61]
[04:55.20]对我已经无关紧要了
[05:03.54]
[05:16.03]无论风往哪里吹
